sql.set:
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName},
version_name = #{versionName},
version_value = #{versionValue},
kerberos_file_name = #{kerberosFileName},
store_type = #{storeType},
is_default = #{isDefault},
gmt_modified =now()

mapper.select: SELECT cluster_id FROM console_component WHERE id = #{componentId} and is_deleted = 0

SELECT cc.version_value FROM console_component cc LEFT JOIN console_cluster ccl ON ccl.id = cc.cluster_id WHERE cc.component_type_code = #{componentType} AND cc.cluster_id = #{clusterId} and is_default = 1 and cc.is_deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

SELECT sd.dict_name as versionName, cc.gmt_create, cc.is_default FROM console_component cc INNER JOIN console_cluster_tenant cct ON cc.cluster_id = cct.cluster_id INNER JOIN dict sd ON sd.dict_value = cc.version_value WHERE cc.component_type_code = #{componentTypeCode} AND cct.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND cc.is_deleted = 0

select cc.id,cc.component_name,cc.component_type_code from console_component cc INNER JOIN console_cluster_tenant cct on cc.cluster_id = cct.cluster_id and cct.tenant_id = #{tenantId} where cc.is_deleted = 0
